title: Canada : total university enrollment 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of students in thousands has increased over the Year.
Number of students in thousands is slightly increasing from 2004 to 2005.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2004 and 2005.
The highest Number of students in thousands, of value 1020.68 was reached at Year 2005
The lowest Number of students in thousands, of value 994.24 was reported at Year 2004
